meanings.sent1: The cactus had prickly spikes all over its stem.
meanings.sent2: She carefully avoided the prickly thorns while picking roses.
meanings.sent3: The prickly hedgehog didn't want a hug.
meanings.sent4: His prickly demeanor was like a fortress, keeping others at bay.
meanings.sent5: The prickly surface of the pineapple made it challenging to peel.

meanings.sent1: She was prickly when woken up from her nap.
meanings.sent2: His prickly attitude made it hard to have a conversation with him.
meanings.sent3: The prickly cat hissed at anyone who came too close.
meanings.sent4: Her prickly response to criticism surprised her friends.
meanings.sent5: The prickly customer complained about every little detail.
